title: Your favourite GD'er / Red is now a Yu-Gi-Oh card.
body:
*The Harrowing has passed, you can all go home now!*
Time's up for requests, but feel free to post your own in the comment section below. 

Post your friends or ~~request me to do you~~. This is my gift to GD for the Harrowing, seeing as I never finished the Valentine's Day wallpapers thread.

More coming... eventually.
